item.title: [delta] barrows! help asap
item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

[quote=“Abandoned Dreams, post:4, topic:379627”][quote author=rash link=topic=475464.msg3476890#msg3476890 date=1295765189]
Make it teleport them after they click on it?
[/quote]Okay, I added the code like this now:

if(objectID == 10284){ if(Verac == 1 && Dharok == 1 && Ahrim == 1 && Torag == 1 && Karils == 1 && Guthan == 1) { Barrows = 1; Verac = 1; Dharok = 1; Ahrim = 1; Torag = 1; Karils = 1; Guthan = 1; addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 1); addItem(Item.randomRunes(),misc.random(100)); addItem(995, misc.random(4427)); sM("You search the chest and find some items!"); if(objectID == 10284) { [b]triggerTele(3565, 3288, 0);[/b] } } else sM("You need kill all barrow brother to searching for a reward."); }
But You Can Still Multiclick Loot, How Do I Stop That?
And Other Guy, If I Changed It to “0” I Wouldn’t Get Any Loot… Would I?[/quote]

Yes you would… if you dont see that your still getting loot, you can not code. if you can not code, you shouldn’t say “I Wouldn’t Get Any Loot… Would I?”
You should just try it.

Read full topic

item.title: [delta] barrows! help asap
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

if(objectID == 10284){
if(Verac == 1 && Dharok == 1 && Ahrim == 1 && Torag == 1 && Karils == 1 && Guthan == 1) {
Barrows = 0;
Verac = 0;
Dharok = 0;
Ahrim = 0;
Torag = 0;
Karils = 0;
Guthan = 0;
addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 1);
addItem(Item.randomRunes(),misc.random(100));
addItem(995, misc.random(4427));
sM(“You search the chest and find some items!”);
} else
sM(“You need kill all barrow brother to searching for a reward.”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: [delta] barrows! help asap
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

Okay Guys, barrows works a lil, but when i go to the box to get my loot after killing all NPC’s i can just keep clicking the box for loot, unlimited amount of times… can someone help me?
BARROWS CODE:

if(objectID == 10284){ if(Verac == 1 && Dharok == 1 && Ahrim == 1 && Torag == 1 && Karils == 1 && Guthan == 1) { Barrows = 1; Verac = 1; Dharok = 1; Ahrim = 1; Torag = 1; Karils = 1; Guthan = 1; addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 1); addItem(Item.randomRunes(),misc.random(100)); addItem(995, misc.random(4427)); sM("You search the chest and find some items!"); } else sM("You need kill all barrow brother to searching for a reward."); }
